summary: The pipeline orchestrates a diffusion prior model, CLIP‑based text and image encoders, a tokenizer, a feature extractor, and a scheduler to transform textual or visual prompts into latent image embeddings. It validates inputs, encodes prompts, applies classifier‑free guidance, prepares latents, and iteratively steps through the diffusion schedule to produce embeddings ready for downstream image generation.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use component that lets developers and creators generate high‑quality image priors from text or image prompts, accelerating the creation of realistic images in AI‑powered content generation and integration into generative‑AI applications.
